title: Why does the M635 fail to import the phonebook through Bluetoothï¼Ÿ
answer: The phonebooks of Huawei mobile phones do not use a standard phonebook format. Therefore, the M635 is not compatible with the phonebook of another manufacturer's mobile phone. If a manufacturer uses the same phonebook format as Huawei, the phonebook can be imported to the M635 successfully. Otherwise, the import fails.
